data.question: What is the empirical formula for NH4NO3@1C?
What crystal system does LiNO3@1C belong to?
What is the space group of RbNO3@1O?
How does the crystal size of NH4NO3@1C compare to that of LiNO3@1C?
data.answer: NH4NO3@1C has a crystal size of 0.10×0.10×0.10 mm, while LiNO3@1C has a crystal size of 0.15×0.15×0.15 mm.

data.question: Is the crystal system of NaNO3@1O cubic?
Does the preparation of [Cu(2-pymo)2]·(M(NO3)m)1/3 involve the use of water:methanol solutions?
What is the yield percentage for the preparation of LiNO3@1C?
Is the space group for NH4NO3@1C and LiNO3@1C the same?
What is the effect of M(NO3)m guest incorporation on the a parameter in the layered [Cu(2-pymo)2]n·(M(NO3)m)n/2 (M(NO3)m@1O) according to the XRPD diagrams?
data.answer: The 200 reflection in the XRPD diagrams was used to estimate the effect of M(NO3)m guest incorporation on the a parameter, indicating changes in the crystal structure.

data.question: What is the role of 18-crown-6-ether in the preparation of orthorhombic [Cu(2-pymo)2]n (1O)?
data.answer: 18-crown-6-ether is used to remove the MNO3 guests from KNO3@1O, leading to the formation of the empty orthorhombic phase 1O.

data.question: Is the crystal system of RbNO3@1O cubic?
What is the crystal system and space group of the compound with the empirical formula Cu(2-pymo)2·(NH4NO3·2H2O)1/3?
data.answer: The crystal system is cubic and the space group is Pn-3m.

data.question: Does the preparation of [Cu(2-pymo)2]·(M(NO3)m)1/2·(MeOH)1/2 (M(NO3)m@1O) involve heating?
What is the yield percentage for the preparation of Ba(NO3)2@1O?
Is the space group for NH4NO3@1C Pna21?
What is the role of methanol in the preparation of [Cu(2-pymo)2]·(M(NO3)m)1/3 and [Cu(2-pymo)2]·(M(NO3)m)1/2·(MeOH)1/2?
data.answer: Methanol is used as part of the solvent mixture for the sorption process to obtain the corresponding clathrates and to reach the thermodynamic equilibrium for the solid-liquid sorption process.

data.question: Does the preparation of [Cu(2-pymo)2]·(M(NO3)m)1/3 always result in the formation of cubic phases?
What is the crystal system of the compound with the empirical formula Cu(2-pymo)2·(Li(H2O)4NO3)1/3?
Is the yield for the preparation of NH4NO3@1C higher than that for LiNO3@1C?
What is the significance of the XRPD diagrams in the study of layered [Cu(2-pymo)2]n·(M(NO3)m)n/2 (M(NO3)m@1O)?
data.answer: The XRPD diagrams are used to analyze the structural changes and the effect of guest incorporation on the crystal structure, particularly focusing on the a parameter.
